Daniella Shevel (Afrikaans: Daniella Shevel) bụ onye na-emepụta akpụkpọ ụkwụ ụmụ nwanyị na South Africa na America ma bụrụ onye guzobere akara akpụkpọ ụkwụ nke aha ya
N'ịbụ onye si Johannesburg, onye na-ese ihe ahụ kwagara California ya na ezinụlọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Southern California ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ na nsonye ndị otu ahịa dijitalụ nke Rag & Bone na Shopbop
N'ihi mmetụta nwata ya site n'aka Jimmy Choo na mmasị ya maka akpụkpọ ụkwụ, na 2018 o hiwere akara nke aha ya. Onye na-emepụta ihe nwere ụlọ ahịa dị mkpa na mpaghara West Village nke New York City

Ụlọ ọrụ Akpụkpọ ụkwụ Daniella na-enweta akpụkpọ ihe eji arụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ siri ike, na-agbakwunye ihe mgbakwunye na insoles, ma na-ahọrọ ihe ndị dị nro na nke kachasị mma, gụnyere akpụkpọ anụ naap. A na-eji aka aruputa akpụkpọ ụkwụ niile na Brazil na Ịtali.
